title: H4 Cashback - Loyalty
subtitle: Real cashback at partner stores
short_description: Earn cashback on purchases at partner stores.
promotional_text: New: real-time push notifications and secure QR Code countdown for safer redemptions!
full_description:
H4 Cashback is the complete app for consumers and merchants to manage cashback programs.

For Consumers:
- View your cashback balance in real time
- Track detailed transaction history
- Generate QR Codes for in-store redemption
- Receive notifications for credited cashback
- Manage notification preferences
- Secure login with biometrics (FaceID/TouchID)

For Merchants:
- Dashboard with generated, credited and redeemed cashback metrics
- Manage customers and cashback campaigns
- Generate and redeem cashback via CPF or QR Code
- Track sales and disputes
- Performance reports by period
- Multi-store support

Security:
- Biometric authentication
- Tokens stored in Secure Store
- Automatic session timeout
- LGPD compliance (data deletion)

Download now and start saving with cashback!
keywords: cashback, loyalty, discount, savings, stores, shopping, QR code, rewards, points, coupon, promotion, money back, merchant, loyalty program
whats_new:
v1.0.0
- Real-time push notifications
- QR Code with security countdown
- Dark mode support
- Biometric login (FaceID/TouchID)
- Transaction history with filters
- Full merchant dashboard
- LGPD compliance
